stimulusHtml: Toby’s Toy Trains produces train sets in a monopolistically competitive market. If Toby increases the price of a train set by 5 percent, causing a 10 percent decrease in the quantity demanded of train sets, which of the following will occur?
choicesHtml: Toby’s total revenue will remain the same.
The demand for Toby’s train sets will increase.
The demand for Toby’s train sets will decrease.
